name: Midnight Warrior
sounds: I am champion of darkness and you are nothing.
location: [[Plains of Havoc]] around [https://tibia.fandom.com/wiki/Mapper?coords=128.61-126.104-7-2-1-1 the Lightbringer's basin].
strategy: They are quite slow when they don't haste, although their melee is pretty high. You can try to trap them or simply lure them to a narrow point, and then just GFB them to death.
